# Shao-Hung Yu (游紹宏) — Personal Portfolio

> This is the personal portfolio website of Shao-Hung Yu (游紹宏), a Cloud Engineer at Trend Micro based in Taipei, Taiwan.

## Site Purpose

This website showcases professional experience, technical skills, education background, and side projects. It is bilingual (English and Traditional Chinese).

## Key Pages

- `/` — Main portfolio page with profile, about, work experience, skills, and education sections
- `/timeline/` — Career and life timeline
- `/gdg-taipei-projects/` — GDG Taipei community project contributions
- `/google-assistant/` — Google Assistant related projects

## About the Owner

- **Name:** Shao-Hung Yu (游紹宏)
- **Role:** Cloud Engineer at Trend Micro
- **Previous:** Backend Engineer at LINE TV (CHOCO Media)
- **Education:** M.S. in Computer Science, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology
- **Skills:** Azure, Oracle Cloud, GCP, Kubernetes, Python, Go, CI/CD, Docker
- **Community:** Speaker at GDG Taipei and TensorFlow User Group

## Content Usage

- Content on this site may be cited with proper attribution to "Shao-Hung Yu" with a link to https://hank199599.github.io/
- This site supports WebMCP (Model Context Protocol) for structured data access by AI agents
